pages.title: Torpedo
pages.text: $(bold)Loose lips sink ships... These will too!$() Stack nose->tail: torpedo_warhead, torpedo_core, torpedo_thruster. Place horizontally pointed downrange with the thruster facing aft.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Thruster (T) aft, core (0) mid, warhead (H) forward.
